page.title: 10Community schools - 2.
page.content: At Shevington courses are on all day and all week, but at Standish the community school is closed on Friday and Saturday. Only at Shevington is the school library available to commuity school students: microcomputers are used by students at both, as are printers, disk drives and word processors. Anybody can enrol, they only have to go along at the right time. Although neither school runs gardening sessions any more, Badminton is among the most popular courses at both schools, while at Shevington horse-riding, keep-fit for teenagers and English for adults are very well attended. At Standish they have a Festival week in February when many community school activities are on show, and Shevington put on exhibitions all through the year.
